name: Flower of Eyes 1
description:
My contributions to the #HENHalloween narrative for 2021.

Drawing on paper is not the same as drawing using a Wacom digital pad and pen device, and so this was an exercise in drawing a scary looking eye from scratch using the latter. After several attempts I landed on this one, and then I felt a single eye alone wouldn’t cut it. So constructed a contrasting flower pattern using the eye drawing as petals - scary but beautiful at the same time. Although opinions may differ, as a result my Flower of Eyes 1 was born.

I decided to process the first image even further and stuck with an orangesque halloween colour to the piece, after experimenting with more digital filters - Flower of Eyes 2 was, I think, a nice contrasting result from the first piece.

Happy Halloween everyone.
